27#ifndef SESSION_H
28#define SESSION_H
29
30#include <tzfile.h>
31
32#define TTYSZ 64
33typedef struct Session Session;
34struct Session {
35 int used;
36 int self;
37 int next_unused;
38 struct passwd *pw;
39 Authctxt *authctxt;
40 pid_t pid;
41 int forced;
42
43 /* tty */
44 char *term;
45 int ptyfd, ttyfd, ptymaster;
46 u_int row, col, xpixel, ypixel;
47 char tty[TTYSZ];
48
49 /* X11 */
50 u_int display_number;
51 char *display;
52 u_int screen;
53 char *auth_display;
54 char *auth_proto;
55 char *auth_data;
56 int single_connection;
57
58 int chanid;
59 int *x11_chanids;
60 int is_subsystem;
61 char *subsys;
62 u_int num_env;
63 struct {
64 char *name;
65 char *val;
66 } *env;
67};
68
69void do_authenticated(struct ssh *, Authctxt *);
70void do_cleanup(struct ssh *, Authctxt *);
71
72int session_open(Authctxt *, int);
73void session_unused(int);
74int session_input_channel_req(struct ssh *, Channel *, const char *);
75void session_close_by_pid(struct ssh *ssh, pid_t, int);
76void session_close_by_channel(struct ssh *, int, void *);
77void session_destroy_all(struct ssh *, void (*)(Session *));
78void session_pty_cleanup2(Session *);
79
80Session *session_new(void);
81Session *session_by_tty(char *);
82void session_close(struct ssh *, Session *);
83void do_setusercontext(struct passwd *);
84
85const char *session_get_remote_name_or_ip(struct ssh *, u_int, int);
86
87#endif
88
